properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy grace, that measured once the distance deep Of Calvary's woe, to seek and save Thy sheep, Has touched this heart, and made it long for Thee, Thyself its Treasure and its All to be.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy glory now at God's right hand above, Supreme of all in that blest scene of love, In sonship tells that heart its wondrous place In Thee accepted by the Father's grace.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When all things filled by Thee are wholly blest, And God's deep love eternally shall rest In that which ever speaks to Him of Thee, Thy greatness, Lord, the universe shall see.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}But ere that day of bliss and joy supreme, When Thou shalt be of every tongue the theme, Let this small vessel prove Thy gracious power To fill and satisfy it every hour.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy beauties, Lord, Thy holy, precious worth, Surpassing far the fairest joys of earth, Shall then absorb its true and constant love, Thyself its Object in those scenes above.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
